abstract.text: This is a basic theme any theme must be a subclass off, or all themes must have as ancestor.
A Swift
has been used so as to allow to easily override some attributes and have inheritance, without having for developers
to implement all tokens.
Any properties of an overridable theme should be defined so as to provide defaults values.
We allow this theme to be derivated and be overriden.
